game

Class Room

  • java.lang.Object
    • game.Room

  • public class Room
extends java.lang.Object
    Rooms are collections of Layers and GameObjects. The class contains functions to add and remove objects, as well as switch the displayed room.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.util.List<Room> rooms
      A list of all the rooms created.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Room()
      Creates a new room.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int addLayer(Layer layer, java.lang.String name)
      Adds a layer with the given name.
      void addObject(GameObject object)
      Adds a GameObject to the default layer.
      int addObjectToLayer(GameObject object, int index)
      Adds the given object to the layer at the given index.
      int addObjectToLayer(GameObject object, int index, int layerIndex)
      Adds the given object to the given position in the layer at the given index.
      int addObjectToLayer(GameObject object, Layer layer)
      Adds the given object to the given layer.
      int addObjectToLayer(GameObject object, Layer layer, int layerIndex)
      Adds the given object to the given layer at the given index in the layer.
      int addObjectToLayer(GameObject object, java.lang.String string)
      Adds the given object to the layer with the given name.
      int addObjectToLayer(GameObject object, java.lang.String string, int layerIndex)
      Adds the given object to the layer with the given name at the given index in the layer.
      void display()
      Erases whatever is on the screen and draws all the objects in the room.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • addObject

        public void addObject(GameObject object)
        Adds a GameObject to the default layer. The default layer is on top.
        Parameters:
        object - The object to add.

      • addLayer

        public int addLayer(Layer layer,
                    java.lang.String name)
        Adds a layer with the given name.
        Parameters:
        layer - The layer to add.
        name - The layer name. This will be used to reference the layer.
        Returns:
        The index of the added layer.

      • addObjectToLayer

        public int addObjectToLayer(GameObject object,
                            int index)
        Adds the given object to the layer at the given index.
        Parameters:
        object - The object to add.
        index - The index of the layer to add it to.
        Returns:
        The index of the added object in the selected layer.

      • addObjectToLayer

        public int addObjectToLayer(GameObject object,
                            Layer layer)
        Adds the given object to the given layer.
        Parameters:
        object - The object to add.
        layer - The layer to add the given object to.
        Returns:
        The index of the added object in the selected layer.

      • addObjectToLayer

        public int addObjectToLayer(GameObject object,
                            java.lang.String string)
        Adds the given object to the layer with the given name.
        Parameters:
        object - The object to add.
        string - The name of the layer to add the given object to.
        Returns:
        The index of the added object in the selected layer.

      • addObjectToLayer

        public int addObjectToLayer(GameObject object,
                            int index,
                            int layerIndex)
        Adds the given object to the given position in the layer at the given index.
        Parameters:
        object - The object to add.
        index - The index of the layer to add it to.
        layerIndex - The index to put the object at in the selected layer.
        Returns:
        The index of the added object in the selected layer.

      • addObjectToLayer

                            Layer layer,
                            int layerIndex)
        Adds the given object to the given layer at the given index in the layer.
        Parameters:
        object - The object to add.
        layer - The layer to add the given object to.
        layerIndex - The index to put the object at in the selected layer.
        Returns:
        The index of the added object in the selected layer.

      • addObjectToLayer

                            java.lang.String string,
                            int layerIndex)

        string - The name of the layer to add the given object to.
